name: df-ply
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cply, cmpt(s0, cpw(cc), cab(s1, wrex(s2, cn0, wrex(s3, co(cun(cv(s0), csn(nat0)), cmap, cn0), wceq(cv(s1), cmpt(s4, cc, csu(s5, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s2)), co(cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5)), cmul, co(cv(s4), cexp, cv(s5)))))))))))
comment: Define the set of polynomials on the complex numbers with coefficients in the given subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
